svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Vertical axis measures life expectancy at birth for both genders. Horizontal axis measures the share of population
living below 3.10$ international dollars per day. Colours represent world regions. Bubble sizes are proportional the
Share of population living below $3.10 per day
Source: World Bank – WDI, Life Expectancy (1950-2015) – UN Population Division (2015)
